channel.title: Sidefy Changelog
channel.description: Latest updates, features, and improvements for Sidefy

item.title: Keyword Highlighting & Web Scraping
item.description: Keyword highlighting, filtering, custom plugin web scraping capabilities, and major performance improvements.

item.title: UI Improvements & Apple Intelligence
item.description: Major UI redesign with improved reading experience, Apple Intelligence integration, and significant performance enhancements.

item.title: Adaptive Colors & Auto Translation
item.description: Adaptive color adjustments for better readability, automatic title translation, and enhanced reader navigation.

item.title: Colorless Mode & Customization
item.description: Enhanced readability with colorless mode, customizable color bar width, 12/24-hour format toggle, and improved multi-display support.

item.title: Architecture Refactor & Event Hiding
item.description: Complete architecture refactor separating data fetching and rendering, event hiding feature, and enhanced plugin export capabilities.

item.title: Image Support & Security Hardening
item.description: Introduced image event support, significant memory optimizations, and comprehensive plugin security enhancements.

item.title: LLM API Support
item.description: Added support for Large Language Model (LLM) APIs to enhance custom and community plugin capabilities.

item.title: Online Plugins
item.description: Introduced online plugin functionality, allowing users to download and update popular plugins directly from the repository.

item.title: Neon Mode & Custom Plugins
item.description: Added Neon Mode, Custom Plugins (Beta), mouse interaction mode, and RSS OPML import support.

item.title: Cross-Desktop & Keyboard Navigation
item.description: Initial release featuring cross-desktop support, keyboard navigation, event enhancements, and GitHub plugin optimizations.

item.title: Welcome to Sidefy
item.description: After over 100 beta iterations, Sidefy is finally here! A powerful sidebar calendar and information aggregator for your Mac.
